about_the_game:
This DLC gives you access to Season 2 Episode 4: Carcaptors! Mini, having spent all night pacing the streets of Hella City, embarks on a half-baked while half-asleep plan for revenge.



... Of Losers, Cool Kids and Gods, Cody and Peter have become... Average? Mini(?) returns with a plan for revenge, reunion and the protection of her own Godhood. The plan: transform those gray-eyed freaks into a couple of God-fearing Losers! Unfortunately, with their magical immunity and her dwindling power, it won't be easy. Maybe she can find some help along the way!



Cool Kid Cody is an interactive point & click cartoon series!

Interact with the world using point & click mechanics!
Collect items, make choices and explore in order to progress the story!
Find bonus photos scattered across each episode!
And find game development sketches in trash cans!
Keep your ride powered up by making the coolest choice for the coolest scenes!
3 seasons worth of story, 30 episodes total!

The first 3 episodes of each season are free with the rest unlockable as DLC!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or higher
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 128 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 or higher
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 128 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
